item.description:
This year the Halloween social is at the Wedelns. And we have some work to top the Makasue's social from last year!! WOW. To help you figure out what costume to have, prizes will be given for the best 'cross dresser' or halloween costume! So come prepared to recruit votes!!

Dinner will be hosted by the Makasue's house from 7 to 9pm

Social will be from 9 pm to 1am.

This is a 21+ event. ID is required. Invite ticket is also required for entrance ~$10.
Accommodations at the Wedeln house are recommended. Accommodations are $20 per night. Bring your own linens.

RSVP to reserve a bed, spot for dinner, and arrangements for party tickets in advance as no cash is exchanged at social events.
item.name: Cross Dressers Halloween Ball
